title: After the last update on my Pixel 3a, the screenshot option disappeared. Please advise what I can do
content: After updating by Pixel 3a, the screenshot option disappeared. Please advise what I can do I've tried the volume up with The power button and that doesn't work either. I tried the Volume down button with the power button and that doesn't work either. If this is how it updates work, it's not very good.
